topics.body:
It's weird, I've been watching a lot of Chinese action flicks lately. I'm pretty sure most of my Netflix recommendations are Chinese action movies and period-flicks I've watched under the guide of "research".

And every other movie has been a Jackie Chan movie, dubbed over in English. So I get to see the classic dubbing over in English.
